text.name: info3
text.text: The Fujitsu FM Towns series of computers were produced

text.name: info4
text.text: between 1989 and 1997. They started as a proprietary PC

text.name: info5
text.text: variant intended for multimedia applications and games

text.name: info6
text.text: but later became more compatible with IBM PCs. In 1993

text.name: info7
text.text: the FM Towns Marty was released, a game console

text.name: info8
text.text: compatible with existing FM Towns games.
